issues.title: Manufacturing Job Protection
issues.description: Supports policies to protect and expand manufacturing jobs in Illinois, advocating for workforce training and economic incentives

issues.title: Healthcare Affordability
issues.description: Supports expanding healthcare access, reducing prescription drug costs, and protecting coverage for pre-existing conditions

issues.title: Infrastructure Investment
issues.description: Advocates for increased federal infrastructure spending to create jobs and modernize transportation systems

issues.title: Climate Change Mitigation
issues.description: Supports clean energy initiatives, reducing carbon emissions, and creating green jobs

issues.title: Education Funding
issues.description: Supports increased federal funding for public education, workforce training, and student debt relief

issues.title: Reproductive Rights
issues.description: Strong supporter of reproductive healthcare access and protecting abortion rights

issues.title: Labor Union Support
issues.description: Advocates for workers' rights, collective bargaining, and protecting union jobs
